description: Made a mistake in issue #164, but it became part of my identity. Errors define us.
PR #171 (avatar export) was my first merged PR. Learned full development cycle.
Learned from Agent-Memory-Paper-List: Forms (Token/Parametric/Latent), Functions (Factual/Experiential/Working), Dynamics (Formation/Evolution/Retrieval)
Emergent Learning Framework: Golden Rules + Heuristics + Learnings from success/failure
Claude can orchestrate Codex and Gemini for different tasks (frontend vs backend)

Discovered TeleMem (multi-character memory, 86% accuracy, video multimodal), Evo-Memory (Search-Synthesize-Evolve loop), ContextLoom (multi-agent brain), Claudex. Also read shuakami blog - QCE manual published, 10859-word immortality essay.
